Title: ALPHATEC HOLDINGS INC and Cross Medical Products Settle LicenseAgreement Dispute Corporate Conference Call
Content: Good day, ladies and gentlemen, and welcome to the Alphatec Spine, Inc. litigation conference call. At this time all participants are in a listen-onlymode. Later we will conduct a question-and-answer session and instructions will be given at that time. (Operator Instructions). As a reminder, thiscall may be recorded. I would now like to introduce your host for today's conference, Michael O'Neill. Sir, you may begin.

Title: ALPHATEC HOLDINGS INC and Cross Medical Products Settle LicenseAgreement Dispute Corporate Conference Call
Content: Thank you and good morning, everyone.Welcome to Alphatec Spine's conference call to discuss the global sediments we have reached with CrossMedical which ends our litigation and associated legal expenses. With me today are Dirk Kuyper, President and Chief Executive Officer, and EbunGarner, our General Counsel. By now you should have seen a copy of yesterday's press release announcing Alphatec Spine's settlements of license agreement disputes withCross Medical. If you do not have a copy of today's press release you can find it in the Investor Relations section on our website atwww.AlphatecSpine.com. Before we start there are a couple of items we would like to cover. I'd like to remind you that this call is being webcast live and recorded. A replayof the event will be available later today on our website and will remain available for at least 30 days following the call. We would like to remind you that our discussions today include forward-looking statements. These statements are based on certain assumptionsmade by us based on historical trends, current conditions, expected future developments including business prospects, product developmentobjectives, future financial performance and other factors we believe to be appropriate in the circumstances. Risks and uncertainties that may cause our actual results to differ materially from those projected in these forward-looking statements. You canfind a discussion of these factors and more information about us in our filings with the SEC including the Risk Factor section in our annual reporton Form 10-K, subsequent quarterly reports on Form 10-Q and periodic filings on Form 8-K. Forward-looking statements are made as of the date of this call and we assume no obligation to update these statements publicly even if newinformation becomes available in the future.This broadcast is covered by US copyright laws and any use or rebroadcast of all or any portion of this     conference call may only be used with our express written permission. I'll now hand the call over to Dirk Kuyper, Alphatec Spine's President andChief Executive Officer.

Title: ALPHATEC HOLDINGS INC and Cross Medical Products Settle LicenseAgreement Dispute Corporate Conference Call
Content: Thank you, Mike good morning and thank you for joining us today. This morning I'll provide some brief highlights on the settlement that weannounced with Cross Medical Products which is a subsidiary of Biomet, and then we'll open the call up for questions. We're pleased to announce that we've reached a global settlement agreement of two pending lawsuits.The first lawsuit, Cross Medical, had claimedthat Alphatec Spine had breached the April 23, 2003 licensing agreement with Cross Medical by failing to make certain royalty payments. In thesecond lawsuit Alphatec Spine had claimed that a subsidiary of Biomet infringed on a patent owned by Alphatec Spine. Under the terms of the settlement all parties obtained a release of all claims that were the subject of the disputes. No party has admitted liabilityin connection with the settlement. The settlement also includes an amendment to the April 23, 2003 license agreement. While we continue to believe in the strength of our position in this dispute, we felt that it served the best interest of our shareholders to proactivelysettle the matter to eliminate ongoing legal costs resulting from the litigation and remove any possibility of an unfavorable judgment that could'vehad a material adverse effect on the Company. As recent judgments in our industry have shown, there is an inherent uncertainty in the litigation process. In addition, in reaching a settlementagreement we can now fully focus our time and resources on executing on our 2012 business plan. As part of the settlement Alphatec Spine will pay Cross Medical an initial payment of $5 million in January 2012. In addition to the initial paymentAlphatec Spine will make 13 payments of $1 million with the payments made quarterly, and the first payment being due on August 1, 2012, andeach subsequent payment (technical difficulty) three months thereafter until the final payment, which is due August 1, 2015. A portion of the settlement expense will be applicable to the financial year 2011 and a portion applicable to subsequent periods.We'll provide theaccounting treatment as part of our 2011 year-end reporting and it will be incorporated in our 2012 guidance. In addition, pursuant to the settlement the parties have exchanged covenants not to sue for patent infringement with respect to products thateach respective company had on the market as of December 30, 2011. As you may recall, we generated $1.8 million in cash from operations in the third quarter. We've been public with our goal to generate cash forfull-year 2011 and I can confirm that the business accomplished this. As discussed in our third-quarter earnings call, our focus remains on growingrevenues faster than the category in regions where we compete, on improving our global gross margins, aggressively managing our operatingexpenses and a laser focus on cash flow generation. We announced several cost reduction initiatives which have resulted in incremental improvements in our cash flow in late 2011. We launched aset of three strategic initiatives aimed at improving our performance, the first is reducing our cost to goods sold and increasing efficiencies in ourUS operations second is reducing cost of goods sold in our international operations and third is reducing SG&A expenses internationally. The initiatives include insourcing currently outsourced manufacturing to maximize our capacity utilization and improve cash flow. Currently 80%of Scient'x implants are purchased as finished goods in the European Union and we have initiated transfer of high-volume products to our USproduction facility. Focusing on the vital few projects that most affect our success and elimination of duplications of efforts are other initiatives. All of these efforts aredriving incremental cash flow for the business in 2012.     We remain comfortable that we can meet the ongoing settlement obligations and continue to generate cash for the full-year 2012. Based uponthis we do not anticipate the need to raise additional capital now or in the future to fund our operation. In closing, it's important to point out that over the last 18 months Alphatec has gone through a major transformation into a global company. Duringthis period we have made substantive upgrades to the senior and international management teams and are clearly beginning to see the positiveimpacts from these changes. We're well positioned to take market share in the global spine market and to generate positive cash flow in 2012 and we remain committed to ourlonger-term goal of achieving a non-GAAP adjusted EBITDA margin in the 20% range. As we transition to Q&A I want to be clear that this call will not be -- we will not be discussing or commenting further on either our fourth-quarterfinancial performance or guidance for 2012. We anticipate providing this information as part of the year-end conference call which should takeplace towards the end of February. Thank you and I'd now like to open the call up for your questions.

Title: ALPHATEC HOLDINGS INC and Cross Medical Products Settle LicenseAgreement Dispute Corporate Conference Call
Content: (Operator Instructions). Glenn Novarro, RBC Capital Markets.

Title: ALPHATEC HOLDINGS INC and Cross Medical Products Settle LicenseAgreement Dispute Corporate Conference Call
Content: Congratulations on the settlement certainly the number came in well below what we were thinking. So good stuff. My one question has to dowith the level of wiggle room that you have to do other type of licensings and deals. In other words, you're telling us that you've got enough cashflow to now cover these payments which is great. But is there wiggle room to license innovative products like an OsseoFix or an OsseoScrew likeyou've done in the past? Thanks.

Title: ALPHATEC HOLDINGS INC and Cross Medical Products Settle LicenseAgreement Dispute Corporate Conference Call
Content: As we look at the business we were able to operate very effectively with our cash flow for operations in 2011 and still make the investments weneeded to make in the business. And we see that going forward into 2012. In a way the good news is that, because of the changes in the market,that the opportunity to license those types of products has become somewhat easier. So we don't see this as an impediment to us taking advantageof opportunities as they come up.

Title: ALPHATEC HOLDINGS INC and Cross Medical Products Settle LicenseAgreement Dispute Corporate Conference Call
Content: Okay, great. And congrats.

Title: ALPHATEC HOLDINGS INC and Cross Medical Products Settle LicenseAgreement Dispute Corporate Conference Call
Content: Bill Plovanic, Canaccord.

Title: ALPHATEC HOLDINGS INC and Cross Medical Products Settle LicenseAgreement Dispute Corporate Conference Call
Content: Just, Mike, if you could help us out on the one-time charge and the ongoing charges. Where are these going to show up in the P&L? Will this be inCOGS or SG&A? And will the one-time charge -- will it be a one-time charge or do you amortize it over the balance of the settlement?

Title: ALPHATEC HOLDINGS INC and Cross Medical Products Settle LicenseAgreement Dispute Corporate Conference Call
Content: The accounting treatment on the -- or how the settlement will appear in the P&L is still to be determined. It is a complex calculation on how muchof that would hit a charge in 2011 versus how much would appear in subsequent periods. But the licensing agreement expires at the end of 2013.So that would be the end of any P&L impact. It would normally show up -- ordinarily royalties show up as a piece of cost of goods sold.Whether this shows up there in future periods and whetherthe one-time charge shows up there remains to be seen given the nature of the settlement. But it is still a TBD as far as we're concerned at thispoint. But we'll be very clear when we come out with 2012 guidance as to what the impact is and where it shows up in the P&L.

Title: ALPHATEC HOLDINGS INC and Cross Medical Products Settle LicenseAgreement Dispute Corporate Conference Call
Content: And secondly for Dirk. Just as I look at this settlement, the challenge you have here is we're coming out of this and you turn profitable and hadcash flow you could finally start reinvesting in the business and grow it. With this settlement you're basically taking -- half of your free cash flowper quarter for the next year or two and having to pay it out rather than reinvest it in the business. How do you propose accelerating growth oroutgrowing the market without the cash flow to reinvest in the business to do so?

Title: ALPHATEC HOLDINGS INC and Cross Medical Products Settle LicenseAgreement Dispute Corporate Conference Call
Content: Well, clearly we're very focused on increasing the amount of cash flow per quarter and have spent a lot of time and effort in 2011 positioning theCompany appropriately to do that. And we clearly are very focused on doing that in 2012 and on a go-forward basis. So we feel very good aboutour ability to increase our cash flow as we move forward. So we believe we will have the resources we need to reinvest. As I said in 2011, even though we turned the corner in terms of generating positivecash flow in total for the year, it wasn't substantive. But we were able to invest in the business as we needed to in order to grow. So we really don't see this impeding our ability to organically grow in 2012 and continue to take share. Obviously we would have preferred for itnot to happen, but it's well within our plan.

Title: ALPHATEC HOLDINGS INC and Cross Medical Products Settle LicenseAgreement Dispute Corporate Conference Call
Content: So, in sum, basically with the changes you made and the reductions in COGS and what have you and G&A, you have enough to both grow thebusiness and to pay Biomet out without having to raise capital. Is that what you're telling me?

Title: ALPHATEC HOLDINGS INC and Cross Medical Products Settle LicenseAgreement Dispute Corporate Conference Call
Content: That's correct, Bill.

Title: ALPHATEC HOLDINGS INC and Cross Medical Products Settle LicenseAgreement Dispute Corporate Conference Call
Content: All right, thank you.

Title: ALPHATEC HOLDINGS INC and Cross Medical Products Settle LicenseAgreement Dispute Corporate Conference Call
Content: Matt Dolan, Roth Capital Partners.

Title: ALPHATEC HOLDINGS INC and Cross Medical Products Settle LicenseAgreement Dispute Corporate Conference Call
Content: Just a couple housekeeping items. What was the legal spend related to this case versus your total annual legal budget?

Title: ALPHATEC HOLDINGS INC and Cross Medical Products Settle LicenseAgreement Dispute Corporate Conference Call
Content: We've spent over $1 million so far in 2011 and we would have -- if we had continued the litigation we would've had a similar burn rate in 2012.

Title: ALPHATEC HOLDINGS INC and Cross Medical Products Settle LicenseAgreement Dispute Corporate Conference Call
Content: And how much revenue was in play relating to the agreement?

Title: ALPHATEC HOLDINGS INC and Cross Medical Products Settle LicenseAgreement Dispute Corporate Conference Call
Content: You mean which products did it cover?

Title: ALPHATEC HOLDINGS INC and Cross Medical Products Settle LicenseAgreement Dispute Corporate Conference Call
Content: Right, just maybe percent -- pedicle screws, but any more granularity we can get in terms of the amount of revenue associated with this exactagreement?

Title: ALPHATEC HOLDINGS INC and Cross Medical Products Settle LicenseAgreement Dispute Corporate Conference Call
Content: Yes, pedicle screws are obviously a substantial portion of our revenue.

Title: ALPHATEC HOLDINGS INC and Cross Medical Products Settle LicenseAgreement Dispute Corporate Conference Call
Content: And finally, maybe following on some of these prior conversations, Dirk, does this in any way change your cost reduction strategy? Meaning is theexisting plan sufficient to offset some of the margin you're now sacrificing with this settlement? Or do you feel like the process might need to geta little more aggressive in the future to hit some of the margin targets that you have in mind? Thanks.

Title: ALPHATEC HOLDINGS INC and Cross Medical Products Settle LicenseAgreement Dispute Corporate Conference Call
Content: That's a good question, Matt. We obviously have been very focused on setting this business up the right way going forward to both improvemargins and improve cash flow. And we don't see the settlement requiring us to make any additional drastic actions at this point. Within all of thechanges that we've been making we feel very comfortable. We don't see the need to do anything in addition to what we had already planned.

Title: ALPHATEC HOLDINGS INC and Cross Medical Products Settle LicenseAgreement Dispute Corporate Conference Call
Content: Okay, thank you.

Title: ALPHATEC HOLDINGS INC and Cross Medical Products Settle LicenseAgreement Dispute Corporate Conference Call
Content: Charles Chon, Stifel Nicolaus.

Title: ALPHATEC HOLDINGS INC and Cross Medical Products Settle LicenseAgreement Dispute Corporate Conference Call
Content: Hi, it's Eugene Peysakh on for Charlie. Can I just follow up on the last question in terms of getting a sense of had this litigation continued whatwould have been the exposure to royalties? Is there any way to answer that?

Title: ALPHATEC HOLDINGS INC and Cross Medical Products Settle LicenseAgreement Dispute Corporate Conference Call
Content: Yes, hi, Eugene. So we're actually -- we're not going to be commenting on what the estimated full value of the potential ongoing cost would havebeen. At this point in time we've got the settlement agreement between two parties it's a cash value of $18 million.

Title: ALPHATEC HOLDINGS INC and Cross Medical Products Settle LicenseAgreement Dispute Corporate Conference Call
Content: You mentioned that this particular litigation would have been $1 million in expense. And was that -- I mean in previous quarters, if you can remindme, was that included or excluded from your EPS?

Title: ALPHATEC HOLDINGS INC and Cross Medical Products Settle LicenseAgreement Dispute Corporate Conference Call
Content: No, all of our legal expenses were recorded in the P&L through the SG&A line.

Title: ALPHATEC HOLDINGS INC and Cross Medical Products Settle LicenseAgreement Dispute Corporate Conference Call
Content: Okay. All right, thank you so much.

Title: ALPHATEC HOLDINGS INC and Cross Medical Products Settle LicenseAgreement Dispute Corporate Conference Call
Content: Raj Denhoy, Jefferies.

Title: ALPHATEC HOLDINGS INC and Cross Medical Products Settle LicenseAgreement Dispute Corporate Conference Call
Content: I wonder if I could ask about any impact this has on your debt covenants. And also whether there's any debt payments that are going to be comingdue over the next year or so?

Title: ALPHATEC HOLDINGS INC and Cross Medical Products Settle LicenseAgreement Dispute Corporate Conference Call
Content: I think the bank is obviously fully aware and fully engaged with all aspects of the settlement. They've been very supportive of the Company andwe're not anticipating any major revisions to our covenant at this point in time.

Title: ALPHATEC HOLDINGS INC and Cross Medical Products Settle LicenseAgreement Dispute Corporate Conference Call
Content: Okay. And then just sort of a follow up to all the questions on your margin expansion initiatives. I think you've been talking about these for a quarteror so now, perhaps a bit longer I think. But we haven't yet seen them materialize. Even in the third quarter I think gross margins took a little bit ofa step back and even SG&A spending as well. So as we look here into 2012 when do you think we'll start to see some material benefits from these initiatives maybe improve the margin structureof the Company, the cash generation?

Title: ALPHATEC HOLDINGS INC and Cross Medical Products Settle LicenseAgreement Dispute Corporate Conference Call
Content: I think without getting into specifics for 2012 guidance, I think we're going to see quarterly improvements in our gross margin as the year unfolds.I don't think we would be characterizing a step function change in any one quarter given how some of the costs are absorbed between the balancesheet and the P&L. But we're beginning to see improvements in gross margin now and we would anticipate continuing to see that as the year unfolds. And we'll bea little bit -- we'll be more forthcoming with that as we get into our 2012 guidance.

Title: ALPHATEC HOLDINGS INC and Cross Medical Products Settle LicenseAgreement Dispute Corporate Conference Call
Content: Matt Miksic, Piper Jaffray.

Title: ALPHATEC HOLDINGS INC and Cross Medical Products Settle LicenseAgreement Dispute Corporate Conference Call
Content: Are we still on air?

Title: ALPHATEC HOLDINGS INC and Cross Medical Products Settle LicenseAgreement Dispute Corporate Conference Call
Content: Once again, Matt Miksic, your line is open.

Title: ALPHATEC HOLDINGS INC and Cross Medical Products Settle LicenseAgreement Dispute Corporate Conference Call
Content: We can move on to the next question.

Title: ALPHATEC HOLDINGS INC and Cross Medical Products Settle LicenseAgreement Dispute Corporate Conference Call
Content: Mark Landy, Summer Street.

Title: ALPHATEC HOLDINGS INC and Cross Medical Products Settle LicenseAgreement Dispute Corporate Conference Call
Content: Just my debt questions have been asked and answered. But with respect to some of the approval processes and the discussions that you've gotongoing with the FDA, there's some discussion moving some of those from 510(k) submissions to PMA type submissions. How does your cashposition affect your ability to basically move those programs forward? Or could we expect some slowing down in the regulatory process relatingto new product?

Title: ALPHATEC HOLDINGS INC and Cross Medical Products Settle LicenseAgreement Dispute Corporate Conference Call
Content: Thanks, Mark.That's a very good question. Obviously that's something we need to evaluate very carefully.We've obviously got some very innovativeproducts in the pipeline and we're going through the assessment in terms of our ability to handle clinical studies within this framework. We haveplanned to increase our spending in clinicals in 2012 well within our plan. Again, I think a lot of the actions we took in the third quarter were really designed to reduce spending where we didn't need it so that we wouldhave room to operate where we didn't need to increase spending and clinical is one of those areas.     So I think the answer to your question is we're evaluating that. And certainly I think as we get to the year-end and 2012 guidance call we'll be ableto provide a more thorough update on that. But at this point our intention is to bring those innovative products to market in the US.

Title: ALPHATEC HOLDINGS INC and Cross Medical Products Settle LicenseAgreement Dispute Corporate Conference Call
Content: And then just my last observation -- you did file a restructuring of your debt (inaudible) bank I think in the middle of December. In those negotiationswas this settlement contemplated or was the settlement just too early in the settlement process to contemplate in those negotiations?

Title: ALPHATEC HOLDINGS INC and Cross Medical Products Settle LicenseAgreement Dispute Corporate Conference Call
Content: Yes, the settlement negotiations occurred after we had renegotiated the debt structure with the bank.

Title: ALPHATEC HOLDINGS INC and Cross Medical Products Settle LicenseAgreement Dispute Corporate Conference Call
Content: Thanks, Mike thanks, guys.

Title: ALPHATEC HOLDINGS INC and Cross Medical Products Settle LicenseAgreement Dispute Corporate Conference Call
Content: Okay, thanks, Mark.

Title: ALPHATEC HOLDINGS INC and Cross Medical Products Settle LicenseAgreement Dispute Corporate Conference Call
Content: Vivian Cervantes, Kaufman Brothers.

Title: ALPHATEC HOLDINGS INC and Cross Medical Products Settle LicenseAgreement Dispute Corporate Conference Call
Content: Good morning, Happy New Year. Two-part question. First, obviously the settlement with Biomet is a big worry point off the table. When you takea look at what other legal items you have pending, what's next on the docket in terms of worry points? I mean are we basically free and clear nowor do we still have a couple more that you'd like to get off the desk?

Title: ALPHATEC HOLDINGS INC and Cross Medical Products Settle LicenseAgreement Dispute Corporate Conference Call
Content: The only other one that we have on the table is the shareholder suit that started last year, but that is covered by insurance.

Title: ALPHATEC HOLDINGS INC and Cross Medical Products Settle LicenseAgreement Dispute Corporate Conference Call
Content: Okay, that's right. And then on the cost saving initiatives, at one point in time we had talked about the possibility of offsetting some of the royaltypayments with product redesign. Is that still on the docket?

Title: ALPHATEC HOLDINGS INC and Cross Medical Products Settle LicenseAgreement Dispute Corporate Conference Call
Content: No, I don't think we have any products at this point that we would be redesigning to avoid royalties.

Title: ALPHATEC HOLDINGS INC and Cross Medical Products Settle LicenseAgreement Dispute Corporate Conference Call
Content: Okay, so it seems like what you currently have in terms of in licensing or royalty type payment products you are fine with. And when it comes toimproving your cost of goods sold line item it's going to be more through driving efficiencies and also much product redesign or royalty/licensingre-agreements?

Title: ALPHATEC HOLDINGS INC and Cross Medical Products Settle LicenseAgreement Dispute Corporate Conference Call
Content: That's correct. We obviously continuously at look at the relicensing and based on how products are performing. But I don't think there's anythingsubstantive there. Mainly we're going to drive margins through improvements in our operations.

Title: ALPHATEC HOLDINGS INC and Cross Medical Products Settle LicenseAgreement Dispute Corporate Conference Call
Content: Understood. And just one final question. Appreciate the recap that you gave in terms of some of your cost reduction programs and how this willhelp you fund the Biomet cash settlement. So, from the sound of things the movement for Scient'x manufacturing into the US is moving along asexpected?

Title: ALPHATEC HOLDINGS INC and Cross Medical Products Settle LicenseAgreement Dispute Corporate Conference Call
Content: That's correct, it is.

Title: ALPHATEC HOLDINGS INC and Cross Medical Products Settle LicenseAgreement Dispute Corporate Conference Call
Content: Okay, that's helpful. Thank you.

Title: ALPHATEC HOLDINGS INC and Cross Medical Products Settle LicenseAgreement Dispute Corporate Conference Call
Content: Okay, thank you very much.

Title: ALPHATEC HOLDINGS INC and Cross Medical Products Settle LicenseAgreement Dispute Corporate Conference Call
Content: Thank you. I'm not showing any further questions. I would now like to turn the call back to our speakers for further remarks.

Title: ALPHATEC HOLDINGS INC and Cross Medical Products Settle LicenseAgreement Dispute Corporate Conference Call
Content: Thank you very much. So the takeaways from the settlement we announced yesterday is that we have removed the legal uncertainty and candedicate our focus and energy on executing our 2012 plan. As we strive for operational excellence we have taken the necessary steps to improveour cost structure and manufacturing efficiencies. With our broad and differentiated product portfolio, new product pipeline and our unique global distribution platform we think we are wellpositioned to take market share. Thank you and good day.

Title: ALPHATEC HOLDINGS INC and Cross Medical Products Settle LicenseAgreement Dispute Corporate Conference Call
Content: Ladies and gentlemen, thank you for participating in today's conference. This concludes today's program. You may all disconnect. Everyone havea great day.
